doc.after: The army employs various individual weapons to provide light firepower at short ranges. The most common weapons used by the army are the compact variant of the M16 rifle, the M4 carbine,[62] as well as the 7.62x51 mm variant of the FN SCAR for Army Rangers. The primary sidearm in the U.S. Army is the 9Â mm M9 pistol but M11 pistol is also used and M9 pistol is to be replaced by M11 pistol through the Modular Handgun System program.[63]
